p: F. sur is used for treatment of different diseases in different countries. In Sudan and Nigeria, its leaves and roots are used for treatment of leukoderma, leprosy, wounds, edema, respiratory disorders, diarrhea, sexually transmitted diseases, tuberculosis, anemia, epilepsy, rickets, dysentery, male infertility and gonorrhea. 9, 10 Ethnobotanical studies also showed F. sur is used to treat swellings and edema, 11 In South Africa and other countries it is traditionally used in kidney problems and as adiuretic. 5, 12
